Download HoloPy¶

2.0.0¶

  • holopy-2.0.0.linux-x86_64.tar.gz For modern 64 bit Linux.
  • HoloPy-2.0.0.win32-py2.7.msi Compiled on Windows 7 32 bit, will hopefully work on related versions
  • holopy-2.0.0.ubuntu-11.10-x86_64.tar.gz For older older versions of linux (we compiled it on 64 bit Ubuntu 11.10)
  • holopy-2.0.0.src.zip If you just need to propagate/reconstruct and want a smaller download, or if you plan to compile yourself.

Mac build (hopefully) coming soon.
